starts.title: Both players stare at each other disdainfully

starts.extra: Also, mock the other player's disclosure

examples.title: Both players attempt your worst celebrity impression
examples.extra: Hold a frozen pose for 5 seconds

examples.title: Both players sing the alphabet off‑key together
Both players tell each other your dorkiest outfit ever
Current player reenacts an awkward greeting while the other narrates
Both players read a fake dramatic review of yourselves

examples.extra: Add a mark in a more visible spot like the forehead

examples.title: Both players recreate your worst middle‑school dance together
examples.extra: Hold hands for the last 3 seconds

examples.title: Both players whisper your most cringe hobby from teen years
Both players share a tiny embarrassing secret
examples.extra: Hold eye contact and say 'thanks' to each other

examples.title: Current player reads a mock love poem to the other in monotone
examples.extra: Swap roles and go even bigger

examples.title: Both players do a goofy dance you swore you'd never do
Both players pretend you bombed a joke and apologize
Current player invents a humiliating award for themselves; the other presents it
Both players reenact your most awkward photo pose
Both players roast each other's shoes gently
Current player reads aloud a 'cringe text' summary
Both players act like over‑eager fans of each other

examples.title: Both players try to compliment yourselves but keep failing
examples.extra: The other helps you finish the sentence

examples.title: Current player karaoke hums off‑key while the other backup‑dances

Both players reenact a school presentation meltdown

examples.extra: The other forgives you with too many hugs

Both players rap your grocery lists badly while the other beatboxes

examples.extra: Say yes and do a cringey high‑five

examples.title: Both players introduce each other with embarrassing made‑up achievements

examples.extra: Switch roles and extend to 20 seconds
